info.label: Software Engineer
info.brief: Engineer excited about functional programming, infrastructure and microservices. Keen to learn and share gained knowledge

history.summary: Engineering reliable solutions in a highly dynamic team with a lot of stakeholders
highlights: Managing stakeholders in a central team: our data is consumed by around 100 other services
Engineering solutions end to end: problem statement, solution design, implementation, support
Leading scrum meetings, such as Engineering Refinements, Standups, Retros, Demos
24/7 support rotation, general OpEx: monitoring, tracing, alerting
Scalability and high load, form 100 RPS to 8000 RPS during sales events
Engineering internal library for functional Scala in Zalando

history.summary: Developer with a focus on a CI/CD in a Data Warehousing project for investment bank
highlights: Developed and integrated new approach of building database release artifact. Forty times reduction in artifact size, five times increase in build speed
Developed java integration service of DB and MQ
Everyday ETL work on a billion records database

history.summary: Started as a junior, grew to lead of a team in the Data Warehouse, tasked with document automation system development
highlights: Data mart creation and fine-tuning for optimal user experience

speaking.title: Using shared libraries
speaking.summary: Overview of the internal library, in context of OpEx. Overview of tracing approaches in libraries

speaking.title: Functional Programming and SQL
speaking.summary: Exploring a bit of PL history, similarities and differences between functional paradigm and SQL's select

speaking.title: Actor model 101
speaking.summary: Explaining idea of actors as a concurrency model

extracurricular.title: NYET IT Club
extracurricular.activity: Founded small club, to share my IT knowledge with friends in a form of online meetups, with lectures and homework. All material prepared from scratch
highlights: Python and OOP principles introduction course. This helped one of the members to acquire python developer position
